DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine wether low dose laser is effective on idiopathic subjective tinnitus.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Low Dose Laser in Treatment of Tinnitus
DOC.criteria: Adults older than 18 years old Idiopathic, subjective, unilateral tinnitus with at least 2 month duration Patients with chronic otitis media Patients with tympan perforation with any underlying cause Patients with external otitis Patients with tinnitus related to a retrocochlear lesion or other known lesions of the ear
